title: Ezras pulpit. Or, A sermon lately preached in Southwarke, before a worshipfull assembly Very necessary for these times. By William Freake, minister.
author: Freake, William.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Harper for Richard Harper, and are to be sold at his shop at the Bible and Harp in Smithfield,
notes: The last two leaves are blank.
Identified as STC 11346a on UMI microfilm reel 644.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
